message: My turn to propose a fair deal. This is a good offer, take it before inflation eats away at your share!
Alice, inflation is hurting you more each round. Let's be reasonable and close this deal now.
I'm still willing to compromise, but don't think you can wait me out!
Alice, it's clear we both value fairness. Let's split this evenly and end the game before inflation erodes your share even further.
